---
category: news
title: "Electro-haptic stimulation enhances speech recognition in spatially separated noise for cochlear implant users"
excerpt: "Hundreds of thousands of profoundly hearing-impaired people perceive sounds through electrical stimulation of the auditory nerve using a cochlear implant (CI). However, CI users are often poor at understanding speech in noisy environments and separating sounds that come from different locations."
publishedDateTime: 2020-07-29T09:31:00Z
